column4: I can't find fluxbox do I need to add a certain repository or the default ones enough?
someone told me how to make it so that my laptop brings up eth0 on boot last night but it doesn't seem to work, maybe I did something wrong, the network works once I type dhclient eth0
'ifplugd' will bring up eth0 on cable insertion :)
does that mean when it boots up if the cable is inserted it'll bring it up?
that sounds odd .. what are you searching for?
it might be in the unsupported Universe repository
strange.. maybe it's a bug in synaptic
doesn't happen here.. well, use sudo apt-get install ifplugd then
you can mount your windows shares as filesystems, then you can use xmms
